price: (Allāhu) sọ pé: “’Iblīs, kí ló dí ọ lọ́wọ́ láti wà nínú àwọn olùforíkanlẹ̀-kíni?”
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā laka allā takūna maʿa al-sājidīna
